#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define mod 1000000007
using namespace std;
typedef long long ll;
ll dp[100][100];
ll fact[100];
int main()
{
	ll i,j;
	dp[0][0]=1;
	dp[1][0]=1;
	dp[1][1]=1;
	fact[0]=1;
	fact[1]=1;
	for(i=2;i<100;i++)
	{
		dp[i][i]=1;
		dp[i][0]=1;
		for(j=1;j<i;j++)
		{
			dp[i][j]=dp[i-1][j]+dp[i-1][j-1];
			dp[i][j]%=mod;
		}
		fact[i]=fact[i-1]*i;
		if(fact[i]>=mod)
		fact[i]%=mod;
	}
	
	ll t;
	cin>>t;
	ll n,m;
	while(t--)
	{
		cin>>n>>m;
		ll nn=min(n,m);
		ll a,b;
		ll sum=0;
		for(i=0;i<n-1;i++)
		{
			cin>>a>>b;
		}
		for(i=1;i<=m;i++)
		{
			a=i-1;
			b=n-1;
			ll c=dp[b][a];
			ll d=dp[m][i];
			ll e=fact[i];
			sum+=(((c*d)%mod)*e)%mod;
			if(sum>=mod)
			sum%=mod;
		}
		cout<<sum<<endl;
	}
}
